sense.gloss: to be careful, to be discreet
to do in moderation, to refrain (from overdoing), to abstain
to be purified, to be chaste
self restraint, moderating one's behaviour, penitence, discipline
confinement to one's home, house arrest
Dear Sir or Madam, Dear Sirs, Gentlemen
quality product, product made with care

sdata.j: ご↑尊父↑↓そんぷ↓のご↑逝去↑↓せいきょ↓に↑対↑↓たい↓し、↑謹↑↓つつし↓んで↑哀悼↑↓あいとう↓の↑意↑↓い↓を↑表↑↓あらわ↓します。
sdata.e: Please accept my condolences on the death of your father.

sdata.j: ↑御↑↓ご↓↑尊父↑↓そんぷ↓の↑死↑↓し↓に↑謹↑↓つつし↓んで↑哀悼↑↓あいとう↓の↑意↑↓い↓を↑表↑↓あらわ↓します。
sdata.e: Please accept our condolences on the death of your father.

sdata.j: ↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓は↑謹聴↑↓きんちょう↓の↑姿勢↑↓しせい↓で↑立↑↓た↓っていた。
sdata.e: The listeners stood in an attentive attitude.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑口↑↓くち↓を↑謹↑↓つつし↓んで↑何↑↓なに↓も↑語↑↓かた↓らなかった。
sdata.e: He kept his tongue under a bridle.

sdata.j: Synology はお↑客様↑↓きゃくさま↓を↑謹↑↓つつし↓んでカンファレンスイベントへご↑招待↑↓しょうたい↓いたします
sdata.e: Synology is honored to invite you to its conference event.

words.gloss: to be careful, to be discreet
